page.description: The JavaScript function to call to determine whether or not the user can tab out of the container.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Constrain javascript function]* is the name of a JavaScript function to call to determine whether or not the user can tab or shift+tab out of a container.
The function must return a *[js:true]* or *[js:false]* value. If the function returns *[js:true]*, the container is constrained and the user cannot tab out of the container.

description.p: The *[ui:Constrain javascript function]* is available when the [Constrain tab key] property has been set to "Javascript".
